response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its true worth to be $15,000. Considering its immense value to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving of $3,000 compared to the market value, making it an excellent investment for your needs. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
